name: Get Down (Vallzter)
description:
GET DOWN

This is our game for the final project in Advanced Game Design - Reykjavik University

Creators:

Arnar Ólafsson

Elmar Ólafsson

Valgeir Ingi Þórðarson

Örn Óli Strange

Story: You wake up at the top floor of the office building you work at tied to a chair. The goal of the game is to get down to work before you are late using nothing but a fire extinguisher!

Controls: Hold down left mouse button to move

 Good Luck!
